pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://pub.dartlang.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Pub"}]," 是 Dart 官方的包管理器。跨平台的前端应开发
框架 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://flutter.dev/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Flutter"}]," 也基于 Dart 并且可以使用大部分 Pub 中的
库。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如果希望通过 pub 镜像安装软件，只需要设置 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.dartlang.org/tools/pub/environment-variables","rel":"nofollow","children":"PUB_HOSTED_URL"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以 bash 为例，临时使用镜像来安装依赖："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"export PUB_HOSTED_URL="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"
# pub: pub get
# flutter: flutter packages get","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若希望长期使用镜像："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo 'export PUB_HOSTED_URL="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"' >> ~/.bashrc","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Flutter 镜像使用方法参见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/flutter/","children":"Flutter 镜像安装帮助"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Dart Pub 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
